Class TransactionService

java.lang.Object
com.example.card_management_system.service.TransactionService
@Service public class TransactionService extends Object
Service class responsible for handling transactions between cards. Provides functionality to execute transactions, retrieve transaction history for a specific card, and calculate the total amount of money withdrawn by the user in the current month.

    Constructs a new TransactionService with the specified repositories.

  • Constructor Details

    • TransactionService

      public TransactionService(TransactionRepository transactionRepository, CardRepository cardRepository)
      Constructs a new TransactionService with the specified repositories.
      Parameters:
      transactionRepository - repository for transaction persistence
      cardRepository - repository for card retrieval and persistence

  • Method Details

    • getAllTransactionsByCardId

      public List<TransactionDto> getAllTransactionsByCardId(Long cardId)
      Retrieves all transactions associated with a specific card. This includes both transactions where the card was used as a source or a destination.
      Parameters:
      cardId - ID of the card
      Returns:
      list of TransactionDto representing the transactions

    • executeTransaction

      public void executeTransaction(TransactionDto transactionDto)
      Executes a transaction between two cards or a withdrawal if the recipient is null. Automatically adjusts the balance of the involved cards and records the transaction.
      Parameters:
      transactionDto - object containing transaction details
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the balance on the source card is insufficient

    • getMonthlyWithdrawSum

      public BigDecimal getMonthlyWithdrawSum()
      Calculates the total sum of withdrawals made by the current user in the current calendar month.
      Returns:
      total sum of withdrawals as BigDecimal
